attributes.action: Remove the Living TV show Most haunted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most Haunted has created a misconception about what Paranormal Investigations are truly about.

The petition is created because the show:

1.Misleads people into conducting their own investigations which opens up all kinds of problems regarding responsibility of people on investigations

2.Contains false information on conducting investigations correctly

3.Allegedly contains faked scenes and evidence of paranormal activity

4.Mediums used possibly in breach of the Fraudulent Mediums Act 1951

Remove Most Haunted from TV and allow the creation of a correctly controlled Paranormal Investigation Show

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
